title: "Delta Air invests $60 mln, takes stake in air taxi startup Joby Aviation"
excerpt: "Delta Air Lines said Tuesday it invested $60 million in air taxi startup Joby Aviation for a 2% equity stake, in a partnership that will initially offer passengers air taxi transport to and from airports in New York and Los Angeles."
